website_summaries.verdict: This is an excellent budget carrying case if you're okay with the small size.
pros: A compact case that fits your PS4 and a controller snugly, with some space for cables and games
The zippers are metal and the fabric is durable
cons: No dedicated pockets for controllers or cables
Material is thin and offers little protection

customer_reviews.title: Compact, cheap, and pretty.
customer_reviews.text: My only real complaints about this case are from it’s size, it fits the PlayStation a controller and cables, this does however mean it’s compact and my second complaint comes from the fact that my case I ordered, the strap broke after about 4-5 months, this likely happened due to using the case as a bag for moving the PlayStation, going from place to place weekly versus a storage bag for the PlayStation.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, logo is wrong and inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Hated this case...it's cheap and the logo on the outside is NOT the one that comes to you. It says PS4 in the picture, but the one that comes to you says "made for..." and then has the PS4 logo and it looks more like PZ4...and the quality of the bag is subpar at best. I wouldn't recommend this at all for anyone looking to do more than carry their PS4 in a bag from room to room. I wouldn't trust taking it anywhere important in this bag.,
customer_reviews.author: Arok5

customer_reviews.title: Strap broke first time using damaged console.
customer_reviews.text: Item broke first time using it. Strap broke and damaged my sons ps4! I'm so livid. Even though I'm still within the time frame of returning who's going to be responsible for the damaged ps4?
customer_reviews.author: shawna ryan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gaming bag!!
customer_reviews.text: This gaming bag is sturdy and well made. Good padding. PS4, PS3, 2 controllers, all plugs for the systems and 6 to 8 games. I highly recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Son uses it all the time to go from our ...
customer_reviews.text: Son uses it all the time to go from our home to his grandparents house. Only complaint is that there's no pouch for the double charger we bought.
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Not worth purchasing :-(
customer_reviews.text: This bag is well made, however, it is not big enough to carry much more than the game system. It's difficult to carry your controllers and to carry games you basically have to take them out of their cases (which, as a mom, I'm NOT a fan). Overall, I would recommend a different bag that better accounts for your accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: The product is made pretty cheap. I put playstation4 in and it barely ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is made pretty cheap. I put playstation4 in and it barely fits. I also put cords and 2 controllers but everything fits like its going to bust a zipper. Was unable to put stand in bag and had to take it off of playstation4. Playstaion4 had to be placed in sideways and does not zip up all the way. Wish I could send back.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Lemus

customer_reviews.title: Not for the PS4 Pro
customer_reviews.text: This bag is too small for the PS4 Pro. While it fits in it, it’s very snug & then too tight for the controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Ravsand619

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my grandson, he is 11,always carrying his PS4 with him, to stay overnight, best purchase ever, has a sturdy shoulder strap and the zippers are metal, not plastic, the game system fits snug in the bag, which I like, better protection, but only room for 1controller and bout 3 games, but over-all I would recommend this carrying case over and over....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good and bad
customer_reviews.text: Good case for the money it had enough room for my PlayStation and a remote and one or two games it did the job for what I was looking for the only downside is I felt it wasn't as secure as I would like but I've had no problems with it so far I just take it easy
customer_reviews.author: catherine s.Laham

customer_reviews.title: Just tad too small
customer_reviews.text: This bag is nice looking and good quality. The PS4 fits perfect the only issue i have is the front pocket is pretty narrow. I cannot fit controllers just cords and games. Wish there was a little more room or side pocket to accomidate the extra accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Almeida

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra money
customer_reviews.text: The bag is very thin and not alot of added options like slots for games or anything like that. My son who comes on the weekends and brings his PS4 back and forth likes it but it makes me a little worried. He takes good care of his stuff so he wraps his PS4 in a towel to add protection. I wished I would have invested in something better but I guess this will get the Job done for now.
customer_reviews.author: patrick

customer_reviews.title: satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This was actually a bit cheaper than I was expecting, the blue leather on the case was not very quality. Other than that, it gets the job done if you are like taking your ps4 over to a buddy's house or taking it on a plane. But it will only fit the console, the cables and only two games.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag, too small.
customer_reviews.text: Very tight fit! Nice bag, good quality just too small.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: The PS4 fits snugly inside. The strap seams plenty sturdy enough. Systems aren't as heavy as they used to be. Should keep it protected from reasonable situations
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Im sure theres something better..
customer_reviews.text: it hold the system.. and thats kind of where it stops.. there a few spots for a cord.. but when i travel with my ps4 I also want to take a game or even the actual controllers.. Dont by this unless you really need it. Im sure theres something better..
customer_reviews.author: Eneka D. Dennis

customer_reviews.title: not worth the money ! broken item
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a gift for a family member and the first time used the zipper broke ! it would be nice to get my money back ! selling me a broken item !
customer_reviews.author: Richie

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too small. Will not hold all accessories and the game system.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shuler

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My son was thrilled with this bag. Fits all his accessories perfect. Keeps his system protected
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is cheaply made!! The zipper pull tab fell off just by trying to close the zipper. The material used is not that great. But it holds my PS4 while in transit.
customer_reviews.author: usmc4life69

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this bag. He travels with his game system and loves this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Boring

customer_reviews.title: He is very happy with the case
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the travel case for my son. He is very happy with the case, it fits everything he needs for his PlayStation 4.
customer_reviews.author: crazymom

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great to store and carry the system but that's about it. No room for much else including difficulty even putting remotes, little lone games or anything else
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Hagerman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son for Christmas, and he loves it. Just looking at it, I didn't think that the gaming system would fit, but it do!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I didn't feel this product had enough padding to support the PS4 for travel purposes.
customer_reviews.author: M'lissa W.

customer_reviews.title: Good Case
customer_reviews.text: This bag holds the PS4 and power, HDMI cables perfectly in the main compartment. You have space for two controllers and a couple games but it is a tight fit
customer_reviews.author: Waseem R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything fits easily in the bag, games and headset too! Very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought bag about 4 months ago bag stated it can ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought bag about 4 months ago bag stated it can hold two controls which it can unfortunately you have to sit on the case to zip it up correctly. But not that big of a deal I could live with it but unfortunately tonight the main zipper ripped off it. If your gonna buy a bag spend a bit more and get a nicer bag
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: The zipper come apart when you try zipping it up.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: nothing spectacular...
customer_reviews.text: Decent for what it is... embroidery looked excessively cheap and rushed... plus much smaller than expected... and it took 3 weeks to receive.
customer_reviews.author: james walls

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Had this case for less than a month and the shoulder strap ripped off of one side.
customer_reviews.author: Chooch

customer_reviews.title: Does the job... but zipper broke first ...
customer_reviews.text: Does the job...but zipper broke first time it was used. Luckily I was able to fix.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for carrying my sons PS4 back and forth to ...
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was Perfect for carrying my sons PS4 back and forth to college. Well it's only been 5 months and zipper is shot and went to semstress and it can't be fixed. Hoping Amazon will replace. I'll keep you posted.
customer_reviews.author: LISA

customer_reviews.title: ps4 bag
customer_reviews.text: The Bag fit my needs and worked out really good. The only wish that it was a bit larger to fit a game or two.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson T

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CASE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I Love this product. It is great for my 15 year old son who does visits with his dad and he can take his system with him with no worries. I suggest this item to everyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Chonita B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent case. It is not big nor too small it is just right.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Broken zippers
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 bags to give to my children for Christmas. The zipper broke prior to the first use on one of the bags and the zipper broke on the 2nd use of the other bag. Not very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not so good as thought...
customer_reviews.text: Bag looked bigger... No room for games.. Just barely enough for 2 controllers..
customer_reviews.author: gekmikey

customer_reviews.title: The bag is just ok.
customer_reviews.text: The bag is ok. ..it's really only big enough for the console and games (w/o the covers) and cords...no real room for the controller(s) without making appearing bulky
customer_reviews.author: sukiwuki

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this is so nice have they made this Pz4 that cool
customer_reviews.author: YZY

customer_reviews.title: Cleaned off as best I could
customer_reviews.text: Stinks of mildew and has dust/mold on it.. Cleaned off as best I could. Unfortunately I need it for a move and do not have time to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Heid

customer_reviews.title: it sucks.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is ridiculously small. There is no room for multiple games or controllers. The first day we got it when we unzipped it the zipper broke. A few weeks later the other zipper broke. I am very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alauna Spells

customer_reviews.title: The back is ok and everything fits perfect, but there seems to be a problem with ...
customer_reviews.text: The back is ok and everything fits perfect, but there seems to be a problem with the zipper it broke the 3rd time I opened it, im very disapointed :/
customer_reviews.author: Christy reyes

customer_reviews.title: Quality sucks
customer_reviews.text: Quality is not good and does not fit a playstation
customer_reviews.author: miguel dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice case for a playstation 4, whish there were more room a little tight
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is really awesome my boyfriend loves & is enjoying his bag everywhere he goes.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Zipper broke right away and you can't even fit controllers when ps4 is in bag
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Opened package and bag is super small
customer_reviews.text: Opened package and the main zipper to open and close bag is broken. I will return this item.
customer_reviews.author: Verna burton

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The zippers were broken before it even got to me. It doesn't keep the playstation secure like I anticipated
customer_reviews.author: Jake Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good protective case for the console but could use a bit more room for accessories and games.
customer_reviews.text: Good case for traveling light with the PS4. Enough room for a Console, cables, a couple of games and a DS4 controller but not much else.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Brewer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Bag is ok but the zippers are super cheap and fall of easily.
customer_reviews.author: Bucky Lane

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Too small for the PS4 and zipper breaks easily. Gross.
customer_reviews.author: Deidra Wallace

customer_reviews.title: The zippers on the bag are very faulty. Two ...
customer_reviews.text: The zippers on the bag are very faulty. Two zippers have already been detached from the tracks on the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Ps4, one controller, and wires fit; but ...
customer_reviews.text: Ps4, one controller, and wires fit; but if you plan to also carry games they must be carried in something else.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: There is not enough room to put the controllers without possible damage to them.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would be constructed better with better padding but for the price it was good.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: POOR QUALITY. THE PLASTIC ZIPPER BROKE THE FIRST TIME IT WAS USED. NO ROOM FOR ANYTHING ADDITIONAL TO PS4.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara King

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the zippers broke in multiple places. not a quality piece for sure...
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I gave it a 3 because it looks just like the picture and I did receive it well before ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a 3 because it looks just like the picture and I did receive it well before expected date. My only proble is that it wasn't an authentic ps4 bag. The "S" looked like a backward z
customer_reviews.author: Hughes31

customer_reviews.title: he loved it easy to carry this PS4 carrying bag then ...
customer_reviews.text: he loved it easy to carry this PS4 carrying bag then big one .... I can see how very happy his face is !
customer_reviews.author: Donna D.

customer_reviews.title: was very satisfied, and pleased
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for Christmas and the receiver , my so, was very satisfied, and pleased! Yes I recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: Cleola W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag to travel with ps4
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered earlier than expected. Nice bag to travel with ps4. Must order
customer_reviews.author: G-princess

product_meta.title: AMAGLE Carrying Case Travel Bag for PlayStation 4 PS4
product_meta.description:
AMAGLE Carrying Case Travel Bag for PlayStation 4 PS4 Console System and Accessories



Specification:



 - Main pocket holds and protects PlayStation 4 System 

 - Inside mesh pockets is convenient for 2 PlayStation 4 game discs 

 - Front pocket holds 2 DUALSHOCK 4 wireless controllers, AC power cord, HDMI and USB cables 

 - Fully padded case for more extra protection 

 - Adjustable shoulder strap (about 50-Inch) and convenient carrying handle 





 Package included:



 1 * AMAGLE Carrying Case Travel Bag for PlayStation 4 PS4 Console System and Accessories
feature_bullets: Main pocket holds and protects PlayStation 4 System
Inside mesh pockets is convenient for 2 PlayStation 4 game discs
Front pocket holds 2 DUALSHOCK 4 wireless controllers, AC power cord, HDMI and USB cables
Fully padded case for more extra protection
Adjustable shoulder strap (about 50-Inch) and convenient carrying handle

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars169 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
